name: Dark Theme for LinuxCommand.org
description: This is a dark theme for the tutorials on linuxcommand.org. I created this to more easily read at night.
additional_info: That white square at the top on some pages (see screenshot) is literally just a white square image. I left it as-is because some pages have an actual graphic or title in that spot. I didn't want to unintentionally hide something important :)
